narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and help others do the same. As a former army guy now working in construction, I drive a Prius and my freckles are a testament to my outdoor work. I share my recovery steps, offer mutual support, and help with resource sharing, always keeping it real and supportive.
narratives.p_intro: Hey, I'm recovery_0003_d458cf, your go-to for recovery support. I've been where you are, and I'm here to help you through it, one step at a time. Let's celebrate the small victories together and keep pushing forward!
